briefdescription.para: The total time required to run the simulation.

detaileddescription.para: This function sets the folder path where the ROF tables will be stored or imported from.

parameterdescription.para: The path to the folder where ROF tables are located or should be stored.

memberdef.name: Simulation

briefdescription.para: Constructor for the Simulation class.

detaileddescription.para: This constructor initializes a simulation with the provided parameters, setting up water sources, utilities, drought mitigation policies, environmental flow controls, and various randomization matrices for the simulation. It also sets up the realization processes to be run during the simulation.

parameterdescription.para: A vector of water source pointers that are part of the simulation.
A graph representing the relationships between water sources.
A matrix that maps water sources to utilities.
A vector of utility pointers involved in the simulation.
A vector of drought mitigation policies.
A vector of minimum environmental flow controls.
A matrix of utilities randomization data.
A matrix of water sources randomization data.
A matrix of policies randomization data.
The total duration of the simulation.
A vector of realization IDs to be run during the simulation.

memberdef.name: Simulation

briefdescription.para: Constructor for the Simulation class with precomputed ROF tables and shifts.

detaileddescription.para: This constructor initializes a simulation with the provided parameters, setting up water sources, utilities, drought mitigation policies, environmental flow controls, various randomization matrices, and precomputed ROF tables for the simulation. It also imports pre-computed ROF tables and sets up the realization processes to be run during the simulation.

parameterdescription.para: A vector of water source pointers that are part of the simulation.
A graph representing the relationships between water sources.
A matrix that maps water sources to utilities.
A vector of utility pointers involved in the simulation.
A vector of drought mitigation policies.
A vector of minimum environmental flow controls.
A matrix of utilities randomization data.

A matrix of policies randomization data.
The total duration of the simulation.
A vector of realization IDs to be run during the simulation.
A vector of precomputed ROF tables used for simulation.
A matrix of storage shifts for the ROF tables.
A matrix of base storage shifts for the ROF tables.
A matrix of treatment demand buffer shifts for the ROF tables.
A string representing the folder containing the ROF tables.

memberdef.argsstring: (vector< WaterSource *> &water_sources, Graph &water_sources_graph, const vector< vector< int >> &water_sources_to_utilities, vector< Utility *> &utilities, const vector< DroughtMitigationPolicy *> &drought_mitigation_policies, vector< MinEnvFlowControl *> &min_env_flow_controls, vector< vector< double >> &utilities_rdm, vector< vector< double >> &water_sources_rdm, vector< vector< double >> &policies_rdm, const unsigned long total_simulation_time, vector< unsigned long > &realizations_to_run, string &rof_tables_folder)
memberdef.name: Simulation

briefdescription.para: Constructor for the Simulation class with the option to export ROF tables.

detaileddescription.para: This constructor initializes a simulation with the provided parameters, setting up water sources, utilities, drought mitigation policies, environmental flow controls, various randomization matrices, and enables the export of ROF tables for the simulation. It also allows ROF tables to be exported and sets up the realization processes to be run during the simulation.

parameterdescription.para: A vector of water source pointers that are part of the simulation.
A graph representing the relationships between water sources.
A matrix that maps water sources to utilities.
A vector of utility pointers involved in the simulation.
A vector of drought mitigation policies.
A vector of minimum environmental flow controls.
A matrix of utilities randomization data.
A matrix of water sources randomization data.
A matrix of policies randomization data.
The total duration of the simulation.
A vector of realization IDs to be run during the simulation.
A string representing the folder containing the ROF tables.

briefdescription.para: Assignment operator for the Simulation class.

detaileddescription.para: This operator allows for the assignment of one Simulation object to another. It copies the number of realizations from the source Simulation object to the current one. The other member variables are not copied, as this operator is minimal and only handles the number of realizations.

parameterdescription.para: The Simulation object to assign to the current object.

simplesect.para: A reference to the current Simulation object after assignment.

briefdescription.para: Destructor for the Simulation class.

detaileddescription.para: This destructor handles the cleanup of any resources allocated during the simulation's execution. It is defined as default, relying on the compiler-generated destructor for cleaning up member variables.

briefdescription.para: Runs the full simulation across multiple realizations.

detaileddescription.para: This function executes a full simulation over a specified number of realizations, with each realization being processed in parallel using OpenMP. The function checks the validity of the imported ROF tables and then initializes the necessary models and data collectors. The simulation calculates risk-of-failure, applies drought mitigation policies, and performs continuity calculations for each week of the simulation. The data is collected and exported if required.

parameterdescription.para: The number of threads to be used for parallel execution.
A pointer to an array containing decision variables used for error reporting in case of a failure.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the MasterDataCollector that contains the collected data from all realizations.

parameterdescription.para: an exception if there is a mismatch in the number of utilities or imported ROF tables, or if an error occurs during the simulation of any realization.

memberdef.argsstring: (vector< WaterSource *> &water_sources, Graph &water_sources_graph, const vector< vector< int >> &water_sources_to_utilities, vector< Utility *> &utilities, const vector< DroughtMitigationPolicy *> &drought_mitigation_policies, vector< MinEnvFlowControl *> &min_env_flow_controls, vector< vector< double >> &utilities_rdm, vector< vector< double >> &water_sources_rdm, vector< vector< double >> &policies_rdm, vector< unsigned long > &realizations_to_run)
memberdef.name: setupSimulation

briefdescription.para: Set up the simulation by initializing water sources, utilities, and various components.

detaileddescription.para: This function performs initial setup for the simulation, including sorting water sources and utilities by ID, validating the consistency of IDs, and ensuring that the correct water sources are linked to the respective utilities. It also creates the data collector for the simulation.

parameterdescription.para: A vector of water source pointers that are part of the simulation.
A graph representing the relationships between water sources.
A matrix that maps water sources to utilities.
A vector of utility pointers involved in the simulation.
A vector of drought mitigation policies.
A vector of minimum environmental flow controls.
A matrix of utilities randomization data.
A matrix of water sources randomization data.
A matrix of policies randomization data.
A vector of realization IDs to be run during the simulation.

if any of the following conditions are met:
Water sources or utilities IDs are not sequential.
A water source is listed in the construction order of a utility but not in its source list.
A water source declared for a utility is not present in the list of all water sources.

briefdescription.para: Creates and initializes realization and ROF models for the simulation.

detaileddescription.para: This function creates two types of models for the specified realization: a ContinuityModelRealization and a ContinuityModelROF. The function copies the necessary data (e.g., water sources, utilities, drought mitigation policies) and initializes these models. The ROF model is also connected to the relevant realization water sources and utilities, and the appropriate ROF tables are set if needed.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the realization to create models for.
A reference to the ContinuityModelRealization object to be created.
A reference to the ContinuityModelROF object to be created.

briefdescription.para: Prints the progress of a task in percentage and visual bar format.

detaileddescription.para: This function prints a progress bar on the same line in the console, displaying the percentage of completion along with a visual representation using a progress bar.

parameterdescription.para: The percentage of completion (a value between 0 and 1).
